ComicInfo.Summary:
The fight against the Swarm gets personal as Mac seeks to take revenge against the monsters that wiped out his hometown. But as tempers rise, will Keegan and Lahni be able to keep the team on track, or are they on a collision course with certain death? The hivebusting action continues here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Alan Quah (a) & Sean Lee (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Pierre Droal | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:22:22. [CVDB721091]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alan Quah, Pierre Droal, Sean Lee
ComicInfo.Editor: Chase Marotz, Anni Perheentupa, Denton J. Tipton
